raw_body: SAVITHRI RUPASINGHE (nee THALWATTA) Wife of late Sunil Rupasinghe,​ loving mother of Waruna and Niroshini,​ mother-in-law of Chanaka and Dilini,​ grandmother of Minugi and Randira,​ loving sister of Mahendra,​ Lilani,​ Dilrini,​ Anil and Sharmini. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home”. Cremation on Wednesday,​ 8th at Borella Cemetery at 1.30 p.m.072067
